summary: A lonely computer programmer exacts harsh revenge on three teenage girls after they play a cruel prank on him.
cast: Anne Winters|Travis Hammer|Annalisa Cochrane|Lauren Gaw|Alexandra Paul|Jamie Luner|Chase Austin|Kesia Elwin|Randy Blekitas|T.J. Alvarado|Preston James Hillier|Noel Gugliemi|Mann Alfonso|Michael Segovia|Dean Austin|Vanessa Barco|Alyssa Baric|Kaitlyn Fae|John Keating|Grace Lee|Charlie Paulson|Daniel Quinn|Jennifer Sommerfeld
title: Encuentro frustrado
